name: Nikola Tesla
description:
Based on GDS230 Game A Week theme, Historical Figures. A partnered up week where we decided to create a game based on Nikola Tesla. 
===============================================================
Solve the puzzle to bring electricity back to Tesla's lab!

Movement: WASD

Press E to pick up

All credits to original artist:

Seven Nation Army TESLA COIL By Franzoli Electronics (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MiHGDYeMAAU)
